Text: Fantastic my friend.  Thank you so much for this.  Been looking everywhere.  Please keep seeding!!  I'll d/l this tonight.  Thanks again!!!

Hey ogvh5150:  If you're still around, thanks again for this.  The quality is really pretty good for an avi.   I wonder if you would be willing to rip this uncompressed as a DVD (iso, Video TS, etc).  It's such a great film in its original cut.  Needs to be preserved.
